title: test mAP: img-size 416  is bigger than img-size 608
body:
Hello! When I test my model, the mAP of img-size 416  is bigger than img-size 608. What's wrong? Looking forward to your reply！
608:
```
Namespace(batch_size=16, cfg='cfg/yolov3-voc.cfg', conf_thres=0.001, data='data/voc.data', gpus='3', img_size=608, iou_thres=0.5, nms_thres=0.5, save_json=False, weights='weights/last.pt')           
Using CUDA device0 _CudaDeviceProperties(name='GeForce GTX 1080 Ti', total_memory=11178MB)

                         Class    Images   Targets         P         R       mAP        F1: 100%|████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████ 310/310 [08:24<00:00,  1.63s/it]
                           all  4.95e+03   1.2e+04    0.0301     0.892     0.642     0.058
```

416:
```
Namespace(batch_size=16, cfg='cfg/yolov3-voc.cfg', conf_thres=0.001, data='data/voc.data', gpus='1', img_size=416, iou_thres=0.5, nms_thres=0.5, save_json=False, weights='weights/best.pt')
Using CUDA device0 _CudaDeviceProperties(name='GeForce GTX 1080 Ti', total_memory=11178MB)

                         Class    Images   Targets         P         R       mAP        F1: 100%|█████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████████| 310/310 [06:30<00:00,  1.26s/it]
                           all  4.95e+03   1.2e+04    0.0531     0.878     0.695    0.0983
```
